ingredients.name: Bulleit bourbon
ingredients.notes: Bulleit bourbon provides a robust backbone with hints of oak and vanilla.

ingredients.name: maraschino cherry
ingredients.notes: Maraschino cherry adds a touch of fruity sweetness with an almond-like note.

ingredients.name: orange peel
ingredients.notes: Orange peel infuses a bright, citrus aroma complementing the bourbon's richness.

ingredients.name: sugar
ingredients.notes: Sugar softens and balances the bourbon's heat, delivering a smooth texture.

ingredients.name: Angostura bitters
ingredients.notes: Angostura bitters contributes a complex, herbal undertone that enhances the overall flavor profile.

tasting_notes.description: Sip begins with a pleasant sweetness, transitioning to the warm, spicy flavors of bourbon enlightened by a hint of citrus.
Bold and full-bodied, with the Angostura bitters adding depth and complexity.
The maraschino cherry and orange garnish further imbue the cocktail with a fruit-forward finish.
Perfectly balanced, this Old Fashioned offers a classic and refined cocktail experience.
